title: WW1 (Beginner)
intro: Let's learn about a few key concepts from World War 1 (WW1), a significant event in history.
outro: Congratulations! You have completed learning about WW1.

concepts.name: Introduction to WW1
concepts.explain: WW1 was a major war that took place in the early 20th century involving many countries. It was a time of great conflict and change.
concepts.example: Imagine countries fighting against each other like players in a game trying to win control over certain areas.

check.question: What was World War 1 known for?
